summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6693 for the improvement of S. Andover St. from 6th Ave. S. to Airport Way S; by paving the same with three inches of asphaltic concrete on the existing street surface; under Ordinance No. 106813, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of Land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
